faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: WireGuard is a modern, fast, and secure VPN protocol. It uses state-of-the-art cryptography and is designed to be simpler and more efficient than older protocols like OpenVPN.
faq.a2: Credits are earned across the Ayiti Ecosystem. Complete lessons, answer trivia questions, generate solar energy, or recycle materials to earn credits that can be spent on VPN subscriptions.
faq.q3: Can I use VPN on multiple devices?
faq.a3: Yes! Depending on your plan, you can connect multiple devices simultaneously. Each device gets its own configuration file that you import into the WireGuard app.
faq.q4: What happens when my subscription expires?
faq.a4: If auto-renewal is enabled and you have enough credits, your subscription will automatically renew. Otherwise, your VPN access will be paused until you renew manually.

step1.title: Download WireGuard
step1.desc: Install the WireGuard application for your device from the links above.

step2.title: Get Your Configuration
step2.desc: Go to your Dashboard, add a device, and download the configuration file.

step3.title: Import Configuration
step3.desc: Open WireGuard, click "Import tunnel(s) from file" and select your downloaded .conf file.

step4.title: Connect!
step4.desc: Click "Activate" to connect to the VPN. Your connection is now secure!
